mapper.select: select round(avg(rating), 1) from review where spaceid = #{spaceId}
select * from reply where spaceid = #{spaceId} order by replydate desc
select * from review where spaceid = #{spaceId} order by reviewdate desc
select * from qna where spaceid = #{spaceId} order by qnadate desc
mapper.insert: insert into space(spaceid, companyid, spacename, info, moreinfo, imgname, type , location, price , phone_number) values(seq_space.nextval,#{companyId},#{spaceName}, #{info}, #{moreInfo}, #{imgName},#{type},#{location},#{price},#{phone_number})
mapper.select: select * from space where rownum <= 5 order by spaceid desc
select * from space s left join (select spaceid from review group by spaceid order by avg(rating) desc) r on s.spaceid = r.spaceid where r.spaceid is not null and rownum <= 5
